text: Previous reports have indicated that HAdV - 37 was associated with epidemic keratoconjunctivitis [ 30 , 31 ] , and HAdV - 57 was isolated from stool specimens of healthy or gastroenteritis - affected children [ 4 , 32 ] . Surprisingly , we found HAdV - 37 ( KM378014 ) and HAdV - 57 ( KM377992 ) each in single respiratory samples of inpatient children with SARI , suggesting that they may not be limited to the conjunctiva and the gastrointestinal tract .
